column6: Inhuman chrysalises have appeared across the world…some want them, some want to destroy them…and your favorite superhuman students are caught in the crossfire! From the pages of INFINITY: THE HUNT comes more craziness from the Avengers Academy and the Jean Grey School…written by THE HUNT'S Matt Kindt!
column8: | artist:Paul Davidson | writer:MATT KINDT | penciller (cover):Jorge Molina
